meanings.definition: Showing or characterized by determination or firmness
meanings.sent1: Her resolutest decision was to finish her homework before going out to play.
meanings.sent2: The resolutest student in the class always completed assignments on time.
meanings.sent3: With her resolutest attitude, she tackled the challenging puzzle with a smile.
meanings.sent4: His resolutest gaze never wavered, showing his unwavering determination.
meanings.sent5: The resolutest look on her face made it clear she would not give up easily.

meanings.sent1: The resolutest decision he made was to pursue his dream of becoming a pilot.
meanings.sent2: She showed her resolutest stance by standing up for what she believed in.
meanings.sent3: In a resolutest tone, he declared he would never give up on his goals.
meanings.sent4: The resolutest mindset led her to overcome all obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: His resolutest commitment to his values inspired those around him.
